website_summaries.verdict: Bright, festive shirt that can be your Fourth of July shirt for years.
pros: Lighter blue color and nice red stripes
Made from a soft cotton and rayon blend material for good comfort
cons: Shirt runs a little on the small side
You may want to order a size up

customer_reviews.title: Merica
customer_reviews.text: Everyone on my block knows what time it is when I put this bad boy on. Its drinkin beer, smoking meats, and playing free bird time. If they dont like it they can shut their commie face hole.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this shirt- I bought it for my husband for ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shirt- I bought it for my husband for Christmas. But it is way too small! He wears a L or XL, so I got him the XL and he couldn't button it. They don't make shirts any larger. I''m really bummed. They must use tiny people (not standard Americans) as their models for sizing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C. Waddel

customer_reviews.title: Fun single use party shirt.
customer_reviews.text: It is very loose like a Hawaiian shirt should be. It is soft and the buttons are a solid plastic, but the seams are coming undone after just a few times wearing it. Great as a party gag shirt, but don't expect quality manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: h steenstrup

customer_reviews.title: U.S.A
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to stand out in the crowd at my dealership, bought an XL because I assumed it would run small and I was right. I normally wear a large. Super comfortable and seems durable. How can you not love this button up?!
customer_reviews.author: Kyley

customer_reviews.title: Good Independence Day shirt
customer_reviews.text: Saw Jimmy Kimmel wearing this exact shirt on social media and it looked really cool. It’s a good shirt but looks better on him than on me, lol. Pretty much only acceptable to pull out of the closet on Fourth of July.
customer_reviews.author: boss435

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Colors are bright, material is comfortable. The fit was just a little tight- husband is 6’ tall and weighs 230; we ordered size x-large.
customer_reviews.author: Kritty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé rocked this to the horse races on the 4th of July! Great quality shirt and super cute! Even starches well if you are the type of person (my fiancé) who would starch their underwear if they could.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rhyan

customer_reviews.title: Fit As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Was really worried to order this for my fiance because he has a broad chest. Usually he wears an XL, but I also ordered an XXL just in case. XL fit PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight summer shirt. Looked good and fit good.
customer_reviews.author: SWass

customer_reviews.title: Great 4th of July shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my boyfriend, it fit great and was a great light material for a hot Texas 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: Lia D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Patriotic Outfit
customer_reviews.text: Holiday gift for husband. Husband loves it. Fits well (athletic body) and washes well. Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as shown in the pictures. Has a nice cool feel to it and fits exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is perfect. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Turner

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy Elves and the American flag need I say more!?
customer_reviews.text: Tipsy Elves and the American flag need I say more!?
customer_reviews.author: JBruckhoff

customer_reviews.title: Fits really well actually
customer_reviews.text: But more importantly, the American flag distracts me from the fact that this shirt was made in China and the United States still doesn't provide universal health care. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Reiss MacKenzie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The product is a lot lower quality than expected. It is so thin you can almost see through it. I have purchased Tipsy Elves before and been happy with the quality. This felt for like a dollar tree shirt. The large was also very small.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Winkler

customer_reviews.title: ... a large I ordered extra large and it fits like a large
customer_reviews.text: Even though I am a large I ordered extra large and it fits like a large. Fits me but not x large
customer_reviews.author: Larz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my BF. He’s gotten so many compliments! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chenza

customer_reviews.title: Almost to "American" but I liked the bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Almost to "American" but I liked the bright colors; of course it needed ironing
customer_reviews.author: J. Averrell Neufeld

customer_reviews.title: Novelty Product, but Fun and Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: This shirt was the hit of the Naturalization Ceremony. It's not of the highest quality, but fits well and served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Pena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shirt for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an XL and this was a XXL and fits as a XL does
customer_reviews.author: Cole P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: America baby
customer_reviews.text: If you like bald eagles, shooting guns, and drinking till you fall down it’s the shirt for you.
customer_reviews.author: bcamp

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Great Fourth of July shirt with fast shipping. Fits great. If in between a large and medium usually, I’d recommend the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Muir

customer_reviews.title: America!
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, great fit, great feel. Definitely buying more of these for other holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Himmelfarb

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, light but strong fabric, colors are very vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a thing
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheaply made. If your looking to have this more than 2 occasions I wouldn’t recommend it to you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 4th of July party. Everyone loved the shirt. The fabric is really soft and light. Great shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Clothes are very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice top and bottom. A little pricey but still worth the buy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: your size chart isa all wrong
customer_reviews.text: did not ware the shirt because the pants were the wrong size
customer_reviews.author: louie

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one wear
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is very thin, holloween costume material. Only good for one wear.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Michael

customer_reviews.title: USA!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gets wrinkled really easily but other than that it’s a great shirt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fourth of July!
customer_reviews.text: Liked it a lot, used it for a patriotic party and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mickella Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Used for July 4th. Fit comfortable on a hot day. I am actually looking to buy the same brand that I can wear normally.
customer_reviews.author: tennfly2

product_meta.title: Tipsy Elves Men's American Flag Button Down Shirt - Patriotic USA Red White and Blue Hawaiian Shirt
feature_bullets: Just like our Founding Fathers you too can proudly display your zest for FREEDOM! Like the rocket’s red glare, with Tipsy Elves’ patriotic hawaiian shirt, you’ll stand out amongst the amber waves of grain. Our Tipsy Elves USA hawaiian shirts for men make for the perfect social media pic! Get ready for some likes!

Our funky hawaiian shirts have amazing horizontal stretch that won’t hold you back from climbing purple mountain’s majesties! Work from home or work from the top of the mountain! You’ll always be comfy and free as our American flag waving in the wind with one of luxuriously soft Tipsy Elves’ mens hawaiian USA shirts.

You’ll look amazing with our mens button down hawiian shirts exceptional tailored fit! Almost as good as good ole cherry tree choppin’ George Washington himself! Tipsy Elves’ Hawaiian short sleeve button down shirts for men are the most patriotic way to celebrate your freedom, INSIDE OR OUTSIDE!

Don’t forget to click our logo above to see even more of Tipsy Elves’ amazing collection of seasonal apparel! Be sure to click the Tipsy Elves logo above to see even more memorable gear! Choose from a selection of tank tops, tshirts, Hawaiian shirts and Onesie Jumpsuits that are sure to impress any day of the year! Everyday’s a holiday when you’re wearing Tipsy Elves.
Material: 52% cotton | 48% rayon Care: Machine wash cold, only non-chlorine bleach, when needed, hang dry, cool iron on reverse side, or dry clean
